duties_responsibilities.duty: Define high-level Logical Architecture of the product aligning to architecture principles.
Ideate, analyze, and architect enhancements for seamless integration.
Engage with the AML Domain to ensure seamless integration adhering to the Domain Driven Design principles.
Collaborate with Engineering, Service architects, Dev Managers to ensure adherence of Product Architecture Principles.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
